# .github/workflows/pipeline.yml
name: Security Hardened Pipeline
on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  verification:
    runs-on: [self-hosted, secure]
    steps:
      - name: Cryptographic Validation
        uses: nist-pqc/actions/verify-kyber@v1
      - name: Side-Channel Analysis
        uses: chipwhisperer/action-power-analysis@main
